<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent">
    <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>false</active>
        <always_available>false</always_available>
        <category/>
        <fallback>false</fallback>
        <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session>
        <keyword>IncidentsOlder90Days</keyword>
        <name>How many open incidents are older than 90 days?</name>
        <next_intent/>
        <order/>
        <output_speech_format>SSML</output_speech_format>
        <reprompt_speech_format/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(current, content, attributes, ER, IntentUtils){
	var msg = '<speak>';

	var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
	request.setEndpoint('https://k17alexademo.service-now.com/api/now/pa/scorecards?sysparm_uuid=fb007202d7130100b96d45a3ce6103b4&sysparm_breakdown=65947e02d7130100b96d45a3ce61033a&sysparm_limit=1');
	request.setHttpMethod('GET');

	var user = 'jc';
	var password = 'SNCRocks123!';

	request.setBasicAuth(user,password);
	request.setRequestHeader("Accept","application/json");

	var response = request.execute();
	var body = response.getBody();
	var bodyObj = global.JSON.parse(body);

	var count = bodyObj.result[0].value;
	
	msg += "There are <say-as interpret-as='digits'>" + count  + "</say-as>" + 

	ER.setOutputSpeech(current.output_speech_format, "", msg);
	ER.setEnd(current.intent_ends_session);

	result = ER.response; 
	
})(current, content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder(), new IntentUtils());]]></script>
        <slot_name_1/>
        <slot_name_2/>
        <slot_name_3/>
        <slot_type_1/>
        <slot_type_2/>
        <slot_type_3/>
        <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-05-08 23:14:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7f293e26db6e7600d1a9f1351d96198a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-05-08 23:22:46</sys_updated_on>
        <top_level_intent>false</top_level_intent>
    </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: How many open incidents are older than 90 days?
